page.title: 04Scarcliffe Village
page.content: In Scarcliffe Village there is a church .It is called St. Leonards Church.Outside in the graveyard the paths were made of gravestones.The church was built in 1150.Inside the church it smelled damp and fusty.It had central heating but of the old_fashioned type.It had four arches and three pillars.The font was about a metre long.Then we went up to the altar .On one side there were twelve pews and on the other side thirteen pews.There was a tomb of Lady Constantia who has been buried there for seven hundred years.The bells are rung in her memory every year for three weeks on each side of Christmas.
